section.p: Through sheer willpower alone, you thwart his sorcerous attempt to rip your heart out. Then you manipulate the magic he has unleashed, and send it hurtling back at him. Hammuwas did not suspect you were a magician of such power, and he is caught unawares. His heart bursts from his chest, and he drops dead.
